courseInfo.title: Spicy AI: The Uncensored Creator Course
courseInfo.subtitle: Stop making boring content. Learn to leverage provocative AI to build a die-hard audience and monetize your creativity.

modules.title: Module 1: The AI Ideation Engine
modules.description: Generate endless, viral-worthy content ideas that break the mold. We'll teach you the art of prompt engineering for spicy topics.

modules.title: Module 2: Automated Scripting & Voice
modules.description: Go from idea to full script in minutes. Master AI voice cloning and text-to-speech that doesn't sound like a robot.

modules.title: Module 3: Visuals that Pop
modules.description: Create stunning, attention-grabbing visuals, thumbnails, and short-form videos with AI image and video generators.

modules.title: Module 4: The Monetization Machine
modules.description: Learn the strategies to turn your AI-powered content into a reliable income stream, from sponsorships to digital products.
